attributes.action: Stop any foreign person acting outside of British law
attributes.additional_details: We are a christian country and are ruled by British law so how can any foreign laws be valid here ?????
attributes.background: We have one law in this country but you allow foreigners to practice their own laws  I was under the impression that only English law was allowed to be practiced here but this government allow religious laws to be practiced here if they have no legal right to inforce their laws

rejection.details: Everyone in the UK is already required to abide by UK laws, so we're not sure what action you'd like the UK Government or Parliament to take.
